Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: ヘレン
Entry.EnglishText: Helen

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: 体育館
Entry.EnglishText: Gymnasium

Entry.JapaneseText: 体育館
Entry.EnglishText: Gymnasium

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア…… あなたクレアでしょ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Claire... It's you, isn't it?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、ヘレンよ。 あなたたちと別れてから、 ずっと心配してたの。
Entry.EnglishText: It's me, Helen. I've been worried about you ever since they sepatated us.

Entry.JapaneseText: みんなが故郷に 帰ったらしいって 聞いてたけど、
Entry.EnglishText: I'd heard that everyone had been released.

Entry.JapaneseText: ホントかどうか 気になって……
Entry.EnglishText: I'd wondered if that was actually the case...

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたの元気な顔を見れて よかった。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm glad to see you're okay.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今は家の手伝いをしているの。 心配かけちゃったぶん、 親孝行しなきゃね。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm helping out at home now. I've been taking care of my parents since they were so worried about me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 波音が心にしみるわ……
Entry.EnglishText: The sound of the waves is soothing.

Entry.JapaneseText: 波間に照り映える太陽の光が 瞳にしみるし……
Entry.EnglishText: The sun's rays reflecting off the waves hurts my eyes...

Entry.JapaneseText: 潮風が身体にしみる……
Entry.EnglishText: I can feel the ocean breeze...

Entry.JapaneseText: 会えてうれしかったわ。 よかったらまた来てね。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm so glad we met. I hope we can see each other again.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……来てくれたのね。
Entry.EnglishText: Claire... I'm glad you're here.

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな仲が悪くなって ケンカばかりするように なってしまったの……
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone started acting out and getting into fights...

Entry.JapaneseText: 前みたいに仲良くなって ほしいんだけど、
Entry.EnglishText: And I just want everyone to get along like we all used to, however...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私もガジュマが怖くて、 私……どうすればいいの？
Entry.EnglishText: I also feel intimidated by the Gajuma, ...What do you think I should do?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマも同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>よ。 怖いわけないわ。 真剣に話せば気持ちは通じるはずよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma are <Yellow>Human<White> too. There's no reason to be afraid of them. If you take the time to earnestly speak to them, I'm sure they'll come to understand your feelings.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そうよね。 ありがとう。私、頑張ってみる。
Entry.EnglishText: You're right... Thank you. I'll do my best.

Entry.JapaneseText: 捕らえられていた時と同じね…… またクレアに励まされちゃった。 私も頑張ってみんなと話してみるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Just like when we were kidnapped, Claire was there to help me find the courage... I'll do my best to to talk to everyone.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
